Aura: Angelic Halo.name: Aura: Angelic Halo
Aura: Angelic Halo.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.w3uGXDVEdbLFZVO0]{Angelic Halo}.

Allies in your halo's emanation who are healed by a heal spell gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's rank.

Aura: Bless.name: Aura: Błogosławieństwo
Aura: Bless.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Błogosławieństwo}

Ty i twoi sojusznicy zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do rzutów ataku przebywając w emanacji. W kolejnych turach, raz na rundę możesz Podtrzymać zaklęcie by zwiększyć promień emanacji o 10 stóp.

Aura: Manifest Will.name: Aura: Manifest Will
Aura: Manifest Will.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IqBfoUaWDennHYoZ]{Manifest Will}

You emanate a 10-ft aura. If you have the Multifaceted Will feat, you can choose any tradition. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to saves against spells with that tradition trait.

Aura: Protective Wards.name: Aura: Ochronne Bariery
Aura: Protective Wards.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Ochronne Bariery}

Ty i wszyscy sojusznicy w obszarze zyskujecie premię statusową +1 do KP. Za każdym razem, gdy Podtrzymujesz zaklęcie, promień emanacji zwiększa się o 5 stóp, do maksymalnie 30 stóp.

Aura: Protector's Sphere.name: Aura: Protector's Sphere
Aura: Protector's Sphere.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DH9Y3RQGWO0GzXGU]{Protector's Sphere}

You gain resistance to all damage. Your allies also gain this resistance while in the aura.

Aura: Spiral of Horrors.name: Aura: Spirala Grozy
Aura: Spiral of Horrors.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPGGkyBFbKse7KpK]{Spiralę Grozy}

Przeciwnicy w obszarze są przerażeni 1 i nie mogą zredukować tego statusu.

Effect: Bone Flense (Damage).name: Efekt: Bone Flense (Damage)
Effect: Bone Flense (Damage).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V4IpjSlefultlOuY]{Bone Flense}

The target takes an additional k6 persistent bleed damage from the Strike of the imbued weapon.

Effect: Bone Flense (Reaction).name: Efekt: Bone Flense (Reaction)
Effect: Bone Flense (Reaction).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V4IpjSlefultlOuY]{Bone Flense}

You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.wfUIsKBxCBfXi1TF]{Erupting Spurs} reaction.

Effect: Guidance Immunity.name: Efekt: Niewrażliwość na Wskazówki
Effect: Guidance Immunity.description: Zapewniany gdy ktoś użyje na tobie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Wskazówek}, czyniąc cię niewrażliwym na efekt zaklęcia na czas trwania efektu.

Effect: Shield Immunity.name: Efekt: Niewrażliwość na Tarczę
Effect: Shield Immunity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Tarczę}

Po użyciu Bloku Tarczą zaklęcie kończy się i nie możesz go rzucać ponownie przez 10 minut.

Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Aberrant Form (Chuul)
Spell Effect: Aberrant Form (Chuul).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fu8Ml47ZfXpSYe7E]{Aberrant Form}

You transform yourself into a Large aberration. You gain the aberration trait, as well as the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 13 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of aberration you choose:

  • Chuul

    • Speed 30 feet, swim 25 feet
    • Melee 1 claw (reach 10 feet) Damage 2k8+8 bludgeoning, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Wywyższenie (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 26 temporary HP, attack modifier +22, damage bonus +13, and Athletics +23.

Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Accelerating Touch
Spell Effect: Accelerating Touch.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aiHbS8FGNYAQBF62]{Accelerating Touch}.

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC and a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Acid Grip.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Acid Grip
Spell Effect: Acid Grip.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9h9YCncqah6VNsKf]{Acid Grip}

While you are taking persistent damage from this spell, you take a –10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Adapt Self (Swim)
Spell Effect: Adapt Self (Swim).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUnw9YXaW3YyaCAU]{Adapt Self}.

You gain a Swim Speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Adaptive Ablation
Spell Effect: Adaptive Ablation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GoKkejPj5yWJPIPK]{Adaptive Ablation}

You gain resistance the triggering energy type; you gain this resistance after you take the triggering damage, so it applies only to future damage you take during the duration.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Aerial Form (Bat)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You transform into a Medium flying animal battle form. You gain the animal trait, and gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Bat

    • Speed 20 feet, fly Speed 30 feet; precise echolocation 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 2k8 piercing;
    • Melee 1 wing (agile), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.

Wywyższenie (5th) Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Wywyższenie (6th) Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

Spell Effect: Agile Feet.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Agile Feet
Spell Effect: Agile Feet.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.cOjlzWerBwbPWVkX]{Agile Feet}.

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Albatross Curse
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}.

You and allies within 30 feet of the target gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the target.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Circumsta.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Albatross Curse (Circumstance Bonus)
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Circumsta.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attacks against the target of the Albatross Curse.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Critical.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Albatross Curse (Krytyczna Porażka)
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Critical.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You must roll twice and take the worse result on your next Will save.

Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Albatross Curse (Porażka)
Spell Effect: Albatross Curse (Failure).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.93SjFTGJUTTmAt6j]{Albatross Curse}

You must roll twice and take the worse result on your next Will save.

Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Amplifying Touch
Spell Effect: Amplifying Touch.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cy5W8U4yN9P1EvBy]{Amplifying Touch}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC, a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and deal 1 additional spirit damage on all your strikes. In addition, all your Strikes are holy.

Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ancestral Form
Spell Effect: Ancestral Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xEjGEBvTfDJECSki]{Ancestral Form}

You gain resistance to all damage (except force and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune), and this resistance is doubled against non-magical and precision damage.

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ancestral Memories
Spell Effect: Ancestral Memories.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dtOUkMC57izf93z5]{Ancestral Memories}

You either gain a status bonus to the next spell attack roll you attempt, or an enemy takes a status penalty to the next saving throw they attempt against a spell you cast.

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angel Form (Balisse)
Spell Effect: Angel Form (Balisse).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.E3zIZ4pjlOuWeGRz]{Angel Form}

You transform into a Medium angel battle form. You gain the angel and celestial traits. You have hands in this battle form. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points and weakness 10 to unholy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

  • Balisse Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; Perception modifier of +26 to detect lies and illusions unless your own modifier is higher;

    • Melee 1 scimitar (forceful, sweep), Damage 2k6+12 slashing plus 2k6 fire.

Wywyższenie (9th) Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

    • Melee 1 fist (agile, holy, magical), Damage 2k6+12 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 piercing hymn (holy, magical, range 90 feet, sonic), Damage 3k6+12 sonic, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ogłuchły} for 1 round on a critical hit.

Wywyższenie (9th) Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

Spell Effect: Angel Form (Monadic Deva).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.E3zIZ4pjlOuWeGRz]{Angel Form}

You transform into a Medium angel battle form. You gain the angel and celestial traits. You have hands in this battle form. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points and weakness 10 to unholy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

  • Monadic Deva Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet; +2 status bonus on saves against death effects and effects that manipulate souls;

    • Melee 1 holy mace (shove), Damage 2k6+12 bludgeoning plus 1k6 force and 1k6 spirit.

Wywyższenie (9th) Your battle form is Large. You must have space to expand, or the spell is lost. You instead gain 60 temporary Hit Points, weakness 15 to unholy, attack modifier +30, damage bonus +20, and Athletics +33.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of angel you choose:

Spell Effect: Angelic Halo.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angelic Halo
Spell Effect: Angelic Halo.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.jPZXZjetdauqYuEH]{Aura: Angelic Halo}

If you are healed by a heal spell, you gain a status bonus to Hit Points regained equal to double the heal spell's rank.

Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Angelic Wings
Spell Effect: Angelic Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kRsmUlSWhi6PJvZ7]{Angelic Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast bright light in a 30-foot radius.

Spell Effect: Anima Invocation.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Anima Invocation
Spell Effect: Anima Invocation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X0t0gr7S7CeCt2Q5]{Anima Invocation (Modified)}

You gain resistance to all damage and a status bonus to saves against effects created by evil creatures. Your Strikes gain the effects of the ghost touch rune and deal additional spirit damage.

Spell Effect: Animal Feature.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Animal Feature
Spell Effect: Animal Feature.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vGEgI8e7AW6FQ3tP]{Animal Feature}

You gain one animalistic feature.

Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Postać Zwierzęcia (Małpa)
Spell Effect: Animal Form (Ape).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Postać Zwierzęcia}

Przemieniasz się w średnią zwierzęcą postać bitewną. W tej postaci zyskujesz cechę zwierzę. Niezależnie od wybranej postaci bitewnej zyskujesz następujące statystyki i zdolności:

  • KP = 16 + twój poziom. Ignoruj karę pancerza do testów i redukcję Prędkości.
  • 5 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności.
  • Widzenie w słabym świetle i nieprecyzyjny węch 30 stóp.
  • Jeden lub więcej ataków w zwarciu wręcz, charakterystycznych dla wybranej postaci bitewnej, które są jedynymi atakami, jakimi możesz wykonywać Ciosy. Jesteś w nich wytrenowany. Twój modyfikator ataku wynosi +9, a premia do obrażeń +1. Ataki te są oparte na Sile (na przykład na potrzeby statusu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}). Jeśli twój modyfikator ataku wręcz jest wyższy, możesz zamiast tego użyć niego.
  • Modyfikator do Atletyki +9, chyba że twój własny modyfikator jest wyższy.

Zyskujesz również określone zdolności zależne od wybranego typu zwierzęcia:

  • Małpa

    • Prędkość 25 stóp, Prędkość wspinaczki 20 stóp;
    • W zwarciu a pięść, Obrażenia 2k6 obuchowe.

Wywyższenie (3.) Zamiast tego zyskujesz 10 tymczasowych PŻ, KP = 17 + twój poziom, modyfikator ataku +14, premię do obrażeń +5 i modyfikator Atletyki +14.

Wywyższenie (4.) Twoja postać bitewna jest Duża, a twoje ataki mają Wysięg 10 stóp. Musisz mieć wystarczająco dużo miejsca, aby się rozszerzyć, w przeciwnym razie zaklęcie zostaje utracone. Zamiast tego zyskujesz 15 tymczasowych PŻ, KP = 18 + twój poziom, modyfikator ataku +16, premię do obrażeń +9 i modyfikator Atletyki +16.

Wywyższenie (5.) Twoja postać bitewna jest Wielka, a twoje ataki mają Wysięg 15 stóp. Musisz mieć wystarczająco dużo miejsca, aby się rozszerzyć, w przeciwnym razie zaklęcie zostaje utracone. Zamiast tego zyskujesz 20 tymczasowych PŻ, KP = 18 + twój poziom, modyfikator ataku +18, premię do obrażeń +7 oraz podwajasz liczbę kości obrażeń, i modyfikator Atletyki +20.

  • 5 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności.
  • Widzenie w słabym świetle i nieprecyzyjny węch 30 stóp.
  • Jeden lub więcej ataków w zwarciu wręcz, charakterystycznych dla wybranej postaci bitewnej, które są jedynymi atakami, jakimi możesz wykonywać Ciosy. Jesteś w nich wytrenowany. Twój modyfikator ataku wynosi +9, a premia do obrażeń +1. Ataki te są oparte na Sile (na przykład na potrzeby statusu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony}). Jeśli twój modyfikator ataku wręcz jest wyższy, możesz zamiast tego użyć niego.
  • Modyfikator do Atletyki +9, chyba że twój własny modyfikator jest wyższy.

Zyskujesz również określone zdolności zależne od wybranego typu zwierzęcia:

  • Krokodyl

    • Prędkość 25 stóp, Prędkość pływania 30 stóp;
    • W zwarciu a szczęki, Obrażenia 2k8 kłute;
    • W zwarciu a ogon (Chyżość), Obrażenia 1k8 obuchowe.
    • Możesz wstrzymać oddech na czas trwania transformacji.

Wywyższenie (3.) Zamiast tego zyskujesz 10 tymczasowych PŻ, KP = 17 + twój poziom, modyfikator ataku +14, premię do obrażeń +5 i modyfikator Atletyki +14.

Wywyższenie (4.) Twoja postać bitewna jest Duża, a twoje ataki mają Wysięg 10 stóp. Musisz mieć wystarczająco dużo miejsca, aby się rozszerzyć, w przeciwnym razie zaklęcie zostaje utracone. Zamiast tego zyskujesz 15 tymczasowych PŻ, KP = 18 + twój poziom, modyfikator ataku +16, premię do obrażeń +9 i modyfikator Atletyki +16.

Wywyższenie (5.) Twoja postać bitewna jest Wielka, a twoje ataki mają Wysięg 15 stóp. Musisz mieć wystarczająco dużo miejsca, aby się rozszerzyć, w przeciwnym razie zaklęcie zostaje utracone. Zamiast tego zyskujesz 20 tymczasowych PŻ, KP = 18 + twój poziom, modyfikator ataku +18, premię do obrażeń +7 oraz podwajasz liczbę kości obrażeń, i modyfikator Atletyki +20.

Spell Effect: Animate Rope.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ożywienie Liny
Spell Effect: Animate Rope.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rVANhQgB8Uqi9PTl]{Ożywienie Liny}

Ponosisz karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swojej Prędkości (-20 stóp przy krytycznym sukcesie).

Spell Effect: Anointed Ground.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Anointed Ground
Spell Effect: Anointed Ground.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y3jlOfgsQH1JjkJE]{Anointed Ground}

Choose aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, monitors, or undead. You gain a +1 status bonus to AC, attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws against the chosen creatures.

Spell Effect: Ant Haul.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Mrówczy Udźwig
Spell Effect: Ant Haul.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X9dkmh23lFwMjrYd]{Mrówczy Udźwig}

Możesz udźwignąć o 3 Naręcza więcej niż zwykle, zanim staniesz się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Przeciążony} i maksymalnie o 6 Naręczy więcej.

Spell Effect: Anticipate Peril.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Anticipate Peril
Spell Effect: Anticipate Peril.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EUMjrJJwSgsqNidi]{Anticipate Peril}

You gain a status bonus to your next initiative roll.

Spell Effect: Apex Companion.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Apex Companion
Spell Effect: Apex Companion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qqQYrXaRJXr7uc4i]{Apex Companion}.

Your animal companion gains the following statistics and abilities while in its apex form.

  • Your animal companion becomes Huge and its attacks have 15-foot reach. It must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • +10-foot status bonus to its Speeds.

Note: this effect will not increase your animal companion's damage dice by one step, and will not apply the deadly k12 trait to their attack.

Spell Effect: Arcane Countermeasure.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Arcane Countermeasure
Spell Effect: Arcane Countermeasure.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.h47yv6j6x1pUtzlr]{Arcane Countermeasure}

You gain a +2 status bonus to any saving throws, skill checks, AC, or DC against the triggering spell.

Spell Effect: Arcane Explosion.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Arcane Explosion
Spell Effect: Arcane Explosion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KY2xyMavZHAoG69D]{Arcane Explosion}

You gain the incorporeal trait, are immune to disease, poison, and precision damage, and gain resistance to all damage equal to your level (except force damage, spirit damage, and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune), with double the resistance against non-magical damage.

Spell Effect: Armor of Bones.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Armor of Bones
Spell Effect: Armor of Bones.description:

You gain fast healing 3, resistance to piercing and slashing damage, and immunity to bleed and precision damage.

Spell Effect: Athletic Rush.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Athletic Rush
Spell Effect: Athletic Rush.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UGJzJRJDoonfWqqI]{Athletic Rush}.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks.

Spell Effect: Bane.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Zguba
Spell Effect: Bane.description:

Spell Effect: Battlefield Persistence.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2jWVNdVlbJq84dfT]{Battlefield Persistence}

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering save.

Spell Effect: Benediction.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Benediction
Spell Effect: Benediction.description:

Spell Effect: Beseech the Sphinx.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Beseech the Sphinx
Spell Effect: Beseech the Sphinx.description:

Spell Effect: Bestial Curse (Failure).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Bestial Curse (Porażka)
Spell Effect: Bestial Curse (Failure).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VuPDHoVEPLbMfCJC]{Bestial Curse}

The creature gains weakness 1 to silver.

Spell Effect: Bind Undead.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Związanie Nieumarłego
Spell Effect: Bind Undead.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GUeRTriJkMlMlVrk]{Związanie Nieumarłego}

Spell Effect: Blessing of Defiance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Blessing of Defiance
Spell Effect: Blessing of Defiance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1b55SgYTV65JvmQd]{Blessing of Defiance}

Choose one saving throw: Fortitude, Reflex, or Will. The target gets a +4 status bonus to that saving throw.

If you cast the two-action version, you additionally receive the following: if you choose Fortitude, the target gains resistance 15 to poison. If you choose Reflex, the target gains a +15-foot status bonus to its Speeds. If you choose Will, the target gains resistance 15 to mental damage.

Spell Effect: Blink Charge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Blink Charge
Spell Effect: Blink Charge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TDaMnCtZ72uyYrz8]{Blink Charge}

Your Strike deals extra force damage, depending on the result of your Strike.

Spell Effect: Blood Vendetta (Failure).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Blood Vendetta (Porażka)

You gain weakness 1 to piercing and slashing damage until the bleeding stops.

Spell Effect: Blood Ward.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Egida Krwi

Spell Effect: Blunt the Final Blade (Cri.description:

Twój eidolon zyskuje premię statusową +2 do rzutów obrażeń jego atakami wręcz za każdą kość obrażeń broni, do maksymalnie +8 przy czterech kościach obrażeń broni.

Spell Effect: Bottle the Storm.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Bottle the Storm

Spell Effect: Calm.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Uspokojenie
Spell Effect: Calm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Uspokojenie}

Ponosisz karę statusową –1 do swoich rzutów ataku.

Spell Effect: Canopy Crawler.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Canopy Crawler
Spell Effect: Canopy Crawler.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3JQPqtE7fkscP3f6]{Canopy Crawler}

Spell Effect: Cascade Countermeasure.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Zapobiegawcza Kaskada

Zyskujesz odporność na obrażenia od zaklęć.

Spell Effect: Cauterize Wounds.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cauterize Wounds
Spell Effect: Cauterize Wounds.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sBSalosrt7C4IXas]{Cauterize Wounds}

You can attempt to recover from your persistent bleed damage, with the lower DC for particularly effective assistance.

Spell Effect: Celestial Brand.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Celestial Brand
Spell Effect: Celestial Brand.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WlTR9JlEcjRmGiD]{Celestial Brand}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and skill checks against the marked creature, and deal additional spirit damage to it.

Spell Effect: Charged Javelin.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Charged Javelin
Spell Effect: Charged Javelin.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g1eY1vN44mgluE33]{Charged Javelin}

Others gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with metal weapons or electricity effects against you, and you take a –1 status penalty to saves against electricity effects.

Spell Effect: Charged Javelin (Attacker).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Charged Javelin (Attacker)
Spell Effect: Charged Javelin (Attacker).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g1eY1vN44mgluE33]{Charged Javelin}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with metal weapons or electricity effects against the origin.

Spell Effect: Chromatic Armor.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Chromatic Armor
Spell Effect: Chromatic Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NBSBFHxBm88qxQUy]{Chromatic Armor}

You gain resistance to the indicated damage and shed bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Spell Effect: Cinder Gaze.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cinder Gaze
Spell Effect: Cinder Gaze.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mOUwbIN1SUp8FyPR]{Cinder Gaze}.

  1. Terrible Danger You gain a +2 status bonus to your next initiative roll.
  2. New Life The next time you take damage, just before taking the damage, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to 1 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
  3. Vivid Insight (fortune) The next time you attempt a check to Recall Knowledge, roll twice and take the higher result.
  4. Good Fortune (fortune) The next time you attempt a saving throw, roll twice and take the better result.

Spell Effect: Claws of the Otter.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Claws of the Otter
Spell Effect: Claws of the Otter.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yNTfght6fu9WYKmx]{Claws of the Otter}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and you gain a claws unarmed attack. They're an agile, finesse, unarmed attack that deals slashing damage and additional cold damage.

Spell Effect: Clawsong.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Clawsong
Spell Effect: Clawsong.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7OFKYR1VY6EXDuiR]{Clawsong}

Your claw attack gains the versatile (piercing) trait, and deals 1k6 slashing damage. If your claw attack already deals 1k6 slashing damage, it deals 1k8 instead.

If its claw attack already had the versatile (piercing) trait, it gains the deadly 1k8 trait.

Spell Effect: Clinging Ice.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Clinging Ice
Spell Effect: Clinging Ice.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MraZBLJ4Be3ogmWL]{Clinging Ice}

You take a circumstance penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Cloak of Light.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cloak of Light
Spell Effect: Cloak of Light.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ba1RyDpwq6tfW8VM]{Cloak of Light}

You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to the next 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Coiling Dance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Coiling Dance
Spell Effect: Coiling Dance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.RcZbmSZf2bFYQtTj]{Coiling Dance}

Your attacks and spells gain the holy trait.

Spell Effect: Community Repair.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Community Repair
Spell Effect: Community Repair.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oND3oFBjxrhyVvyG]{Community Repair}

On a critical success, you receive a +1 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects and a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

On a critical failure, you take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Competitive Edge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Competitive Edge
Spell Effect: Competitive Edge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NOB92Wpn7jXvtyVW]{Competitive Edge}

You gain a status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks. This bonus increases if an enemy critically succeeds at an attack roll or skill check.

Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Elektryzacja Broni
Spell Effect: Conductive Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fkUCvynklBGb4LaI]{Elektryzację Broni}

Cel staje się bronią porażenia +1. Jeśli cel ataku bronią nosi metalowy pancerz lub składa się w większości z metalu, kość obrażeń od elektryczności z runy porażenia wynosi 1k12.

Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Contagious Idea (Pleasant Thought)
Spell Effect: Contagious Idea (Pleasant.description:

Spell Effect: Corrosive Body.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Corrosive Body
Spell Effect: Corrosive Body.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9aFg4EuOBVz0i3Lb]{Corrosive Body}

You gain acid immunity. Your unarmed attacks deal additional acid damage. The first time each round that you deal acid damage to a creature in this way, you gain temporary Hit Points. Your acid spells deal one additional die of acid damage.

Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cosmic Form (Moon)
Spell Effect: Cosmic Form (Moon).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IHUs4qn27RrdFQ5Y]{Cosmic Form}

You transform into a Large battle form. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. The melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example), and the ranged attacks are Dexterity based. If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +25, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the stellar body:

  • Moon Speed 30 feet, fly 50 feet;

    • Melee 1 fist (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k4+10 bludgeoning plus 1k6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 moonbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 2k4+10 fire; this form's fire damage is silver for resistances, weaknesses, and the like;
    • On a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Ogłupiony 2} for 1 round.

    • Ranged 1 sunbeam (range 90 feet), Damage 1k6+10 fire plus 1k6 persistent fire;
    • on a critical hit with either Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Zamroczony} for 1 round.

Spell Effect: Countless Eyes.description:

Spell Effect: Cutting Eye.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Cutting Eye
Spell Effect: Cutting Eye.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mMyMOxYzMxADdO5M]{Cutting Eye}

You transform into a Medium daemon battle form. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to holy.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • Ceustodaemon Speed 25 feet;

    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2k10+10 piercing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 slashing plus 1k6 spirit;
    • any successful jaws or claw Strike deals an additional 1k6 damage, and you take the same amount of damage.

These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points, weakness 5 to cold iron, and weakness 5 to holy.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and you use the listed damage.   • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points.

  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +9. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +18, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ankylosaurus

    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 tail (backswing, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2k6 bludgeoning.

Spell Effect: Discern Secrets.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Discern Secrets
Spell Effect: Discern Secrets.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.UmXhuKrYZR3W16mQ]{Discern Secrets}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the statistic used for the Recall Knowledge, Seek, or Sense Motive roll (a skill or Perception) on the roll and as long as you Sustain the spell.

Spell Effect: Discomfiting Whispers.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Discomfiting Whispers
Spell Effect: Discomfiting Whispers.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.t1e3U2eluRsp2izf]{Discomfiting Whispers}

You must roll twice on your first attack roll and take the lower result.

Spell Effect: Distracting Decoy.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Distracting Decoy
Spell Effect: Distracting Decoy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.z8bHh8KVttslQIU9]{Distracting Decoy}

Porażka The creature is off-guard until the start of your next turn.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, but the creature also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks while it's off-guard.

Spell Effect: Divine Vessel.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Divine Vessel
Spell Effect: Divine Vessel.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hiVL8qsnTJtpouw0]{Divine Vessel}

You accept otherworldly energies into your body; while you are still recognizably yourself, you gain the features of one of your deity's servitors. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, as the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie}. You must have space to expand into, or the spell is lost. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Weakness 10 to lawful.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your unarmed attacks and weapons deal 1 additional spirit damage.
  • You gain a bite unarmed attack that deals 2k10 piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Divine Vessel (9th level).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Divine Vessel (9. level)
Spell Effect: Divine Vessel (9th level).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hiVL8qsnTJtpouw0]{Divine Vessel}

Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or your deity is true neutral. This spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

If you were Medium or smaller, you become Large, as the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie}. You must have space to expand into, or the spell is lost. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 60 temporary Hit Points.
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • Weakness 15 to lawful.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • Darkvision.
  • Your unarmed attacks and weapons deal 1 additional spirit damage.
  • You gain a bite unarmed attack that deals 2k10 piercing damage.

Spell Effect: Domora's Defense.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Domora's Defense
Spell Effect: Domora's Defense.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PIdXUPtE6ZGpFpXV]{Domora's Defense}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and fire resistance 5.

Spell Effect: Draconic Barrage.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Draconic Barrage
Spell Effect: Draconic Barrage.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.S6Kkk15MWGqzC00a]{Draconic Barrage}

Your Strikes with weapons or unarmed attacks deal additional damage of the chosen type.

Spell Effect: Dragon Claws.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dragon Claws
Spell Effect: Dragon Claws.description:
Zapewniany przez Dragon Claws

Vicious claws grow from your fingers. They are finesse unarmed attacks that deal slashing damage and extra damage of a type determined by the dragon in your bloodline. You gain resistance to the same damage type.

Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dragon Form (Adamantine)
Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Adamantine).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}

You transform into a Large dragon battle form. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (magia pierwotna, bludgeoning) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Adamantine

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.level,8),14,10))d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage]

Wywyższenie (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4k6 damage.

You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4k6 damage.

Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Horned).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dragon Form (Horned)
Spell Effect: Dragon Form (Horned).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}

You transform into a Large dragon battle form. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet, fly Speed 100 feet.
  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your breath weapon (see below).
  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Breath Weapon 2 (poison, magia pierwotna) The shape, damage, and damage type of your breath weapon depend on your specific dragon form (see below). A creature in the area attempts a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This is a Reflex save unless stated otherwise in the special ability description for your specific dragon form. Once activated, your breath weapon can't be used again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rounds}. Your breath weapon has the trait corresponding to the type of damage it deals.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of dragon you choose:

  • Horned

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2k12 piercing plus 2k6 poison;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3k10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3k10 bludgeoning;
    • breath weapon 30-foot cone, @Damage[(ternary(gte(@item.rank,8),14,10))d6[poison]|options:area-damage]

Wywyższenie (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4k6 damage.

Spell Effect: Dragon Wings.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dragon Wings
Spell Effect: Dragon Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 60 feet, whichever is greater.

Spell Effect: Draw Ire.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Przyciągnięcie Wrogości
Spell Effect: Draw Ire.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Przyciągnięcie Wrogości}

Cel ponosi karę statusową –1 do rzutów ataku przeciw istotom innym niż ty. Przy krytycznej porażce kara wynosi –2.

Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Przyciągnięcie Wrogości (Sukces)
Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jsWthW1Qy6tg3SwD]{Przyciągnięcie Wrogości}

Istota ponosi karę statusową –1 do rzutów ataku na istoty inne niż ty. Zaklęcie kończy się na koniec następnej tury celu.

Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Draw the Lightning
Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.n7OgbKme4hNwxVwQ]{Draw the Lightning}

Your first Strike each round with the weapon you held aloft (or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals additional electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Dread Ambience.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dread Ambience
Spell Effect: Dread Ambience.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1QMjWGq1DPOQr4VL]{Dread Ambience}

You take a status penalty to saving throws against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Dutiful Challenge
Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.caehfpQz7yp9yNzz]{Dutiful Challenge}

You take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the marked creature.

Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Trzęsienie Ziemi (Shaking Ground)
Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Trzęsienie Ziemi}

Creatures on the shaking ground take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, AC, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Eat Fire.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Eat Fire
Spell Effect: Eat Fire.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FWuLUKIbkJZjBiuA]{Eat Fire}

You gain resistance to fire damage.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Element Embodied (Air)
Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vQMAdnIwnV9prPiG]{Element Embodied}

You transform into a Gargantuan elemental battle form. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the air trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;

    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k12+11 bludgeoning plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.t6cx9FOODmeZQNYl]{Push} 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3k12+4 electricity.

Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth).description:

(This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Earth Elemental 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;

    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes @Damage[5[piercing]] damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3k12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4k8+6 bludgeoning.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:
